channel.title: Openssl on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Openssl on TLDRBins

item.title: IMAP
item.description: IMAP/IMAPS # Connect to IMAP over ssl rlwrap openssl s_client -connect <TARGET>:993 # Login a LOGIN <USER> <PASSWORD> # List all mailboxes a LIST "" "*" # Select a mailbox (e.g. Inbox) a SELECT INBOX # Get mail from mailbox (e.g. #1) a FETCH 1 BODY.PEEK[]

item.title: Openssl
item.description: Show TLS Certificate from HTTPS web server echo | openssl s_client -showcerts -servername <TARGET> -connect <TARGET>:443 2>/dev/null | openssl x509 -inform pem -noout -text Show content of a CSR openssl req -in request.csr -noout -text Create Client Certificate 1. Generate a user key openssl genrsa -out username.key 2048 2. Create a CSR openssl req -new -key username.key -out username.csr # Settings +-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | You are about to be asked to enter information that will be incorporated | | into your certificate request.
